cards.name: Rat Race
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain [E].
Add a Wound to your draw pile.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Adventurer's Map
relics.description: Every 3rd ? Room entered, receive a card reward.
relics.flavorText: Whether fighting or exploring, you can find what you need! Flexibility is the real treasure!

relics.name: Hang In There
relics.description: Whenever you enter a ? Room, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: You can do anything you put your mind to! Believe in yourself, you are great!

relics.name: Lousy Relic
relics.description: Once per combat when you lose HP, gain Blur and 12 Block.
relics.flavorText: I subscribed to Puppy Relics and all I got was this Lousy Relic.

relics.name: The Bold
relics.description: Whenever you enter a ? Room, gain 2 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: What kind of adventure doesn't have some mystery? That's where all the fortune is after all.

relics.name: Agmen's Hat
relics.description: At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemies. If the damage kills an enemy, gain 10 gold.
relics.flavorText: Always be yourself, unless you can be a pirate. Then always be a pirate.

relics.name: Bubble Burster
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Strength. Gain 1 additional Strength for boss fights.
relics.flavorText: Enemies think they are so tough. Time to burst their bubbles by showing them who's the real boss character.

relics.name: Fiddle of Fitness
relics.description: When entering a rest site, gain 12 temporary HP in the next fight.
relics.flavorText: This fiddle gives you 12 temporary HP of damage blocking POOOOWEEEERRRRR!

relics.name: Money Bush
relics.description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 5 gold. Upon pickup, this benefit is retroactive. (0 gold)
relics.flavorText: Because money doesn't grow on trees. It grows on bushes.

relics.name: Monster Drops
relics.description: When a non-minion enemy is slain, heal 2 HP and gain 5 gold.
relics.flavorText: Monsters now drop hearts and gold when defeated. Maybe you'll be the next hero of courage, do you have your fairy?

relics.name: Ninja Puppy's Mask
relics.description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, apply 2 Constrict to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A mask that grants a ninja's technique. Smells like dog.

relics.name: One Stone
relics.description: If you end your turn with 1 card in your hand, gain [E] and draw a card next turn.
relics.flavorText: Now you just have to find two birds and you will be all set.

relics.name: Rat Race
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have no Status cards in your hand, add a Rat Race card to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Climbing the corporate ladder is taxing, some say it's feels kind of Shammy

relics.name: Unturned Stone
relics.description: Whenever your hand, draw pile, or discard pile is empty, deal 7 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: There's always the ability to deal damage... you just gotta look for it sometimes.

relics.name: Adventure Cat's Hat
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill, gain Block equal to the amount of Skills played this turn.
relics.flavorText: A hat that grants an adventurer's spirit. Is that cat hair?

relics.name: Bee's Knees
relics.description: When you upgrade a card at a rest site, upgrade a second one randomly. If none are left to upgrade, heal 3 HP.
relics.flavorText: What's so sweet about a bee's knees anyways? Oh, they carry the pollen that makes honey? You win this time.

relics.name: Cat's Pajamas
relics.description: Upon entering a Rest Site, heal 9 HP. Whenever you heal, gain equal gold.
relics.flavorText: The power of nine lives in some silky pajamas. They seem oddly lucky.

relics.name: Darklight's Stone
relics.description:
Unlock each stage's benefits per smithed card:
Stage 1: Draw 1 additional card at the start of each combat.
Stage 2: Gain 1 Strength.
Stage 3: Gain 1 Dexterity.
Stage 4: Gain 2 Energy at the start of each combat.
relics.flavorText: While it sometimes needs help to shine, the support it provides is unquestionable.

relics.name: Dog's Day
relics.description: Once per combat, when your HP is below 50%, gain 2 Strength, 2 Dexterity, and draw 3 additional cards.
relics.flavorText: Every dog has its day.

relics.name: Fire with FIRE
relics.description: Whenever you draw a Curse or Status, deal 4 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: Let's watch the world burn together.

relics.name: Hyperactivity
relics.description: Whenever you exhaust 4 cards, gain 1 [E]
relics.flavorText: Sure, you're exhausted, but there's still a small burst of energy you can eke out.

relics.name: Knuckle Down
relics.description: If you play 3 Skills in a turn, remove a random debuff stack from yourself.
relics.flavorText: When things get rough, sometimes you just have to focus on your goals to make it to tomorrow.

relics.name: Blessing In Disguise
relics.description: The first Curse or Status drawn each turn is Exhausted. Gain [E] and draw a card when this happens.
relics.flavorText: More like Blessing In The Writhes. Ascender's Bane isn't too bad anymore, is it?

relics.name: Devil's Advocate
relics.description: After taking damage, heal for 50% of the next damage dealt.
relics.flavorText: What a compelling argument. I have a simple rebuttal... I take back what is mine.

relics.name: Greener Grass
relics.description: Double the first Buff you gain each turn, lose 1 max [E]
relics.flavorText: For once, it's on your side instead of the other.

relics.name: Nik The GOAT
relics.description: Once per turn you can click the goat or right click the relic to select a card to Exhaust. Gain [E] equal to its cost.
relics.flavorText: Pet the goat, the goat can always be relied on to help you when you need it, just ask.

mods.name: Puppy Relics
mods.description: A collection of relics by NinjaPuppy, some are based on friends, some are idioms. I like to jokingly call it: Idioms and Idiots, with love.
